overview:
Bradford Shellhammer is the co-founder and Chief Creative Officer of Fab.com.

Bradford grew up in Baltimore and currently lives in New York City. He has degrees from Goucher College and Parsons The New School for Design. Prior to founding Fab, he launched retail concepts for both Blu Dot and Design Within Reach and contributed to Sundance Channel, Full Frontal Fashion, and Dwell. His homes have been featured in The New York Times, Dwell and Time Out New York and he has been cited as a design and fashion expert in outlets such as the Wall Street Journal.

Bradford owns 137 pairs of shoes and has a weakness for paisley, all things Eames, and Scandinavian electro-pop. You can read his blog at www.youngbradford.com where he writes about all the things that make him smile.
